description:
While the Doushisha Rugby team is pretty strong, Natsusa worries about the upcoming finals against the strongest team in their region, Koufuuin. In order to try and keep an upper hand, Natsusa goes to drag Ibuki back into the game.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Saifu no Charasa to, Mochinushi no Charasa wa Hobo Hirei
The Weight of a Wallet and the Wallet`s Owner Is Proportional
財布のチャラさと, 持ち主のチャラさはほぼ比例
